text: Edward Charles James Gardner, DFM (August 24, 1924 - May 3, 2010) was an English actor. He played Ernie Prang in Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (2004). Gardner was born on August 24, 1924 in Newmarket, Suffolk, England. Gardner died on May 3, 2010 in London, England from pneumonia, aged 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Actors from Suffolk Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:Infectious disease deaths in England
title: Jimmy Gardner
